resources.string: Using the three letters shown, enter a word that contains all of them. The word must be a valid english dictionary word. Make as many words as you can in the time limit!

Each letter has an associated point value, based on scrabble points. Your score for each word is the sum of the point values of each letter. More unique letters have higher point values (ie. Q, X, Z). You can skip but you will lose points.
